com.example.datavirus

Class DPCData

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.datavirus.DPCData

  • public class DPCData
extends java.lang.Object
    Objects from this class will contain data from Nazionale, Regionale and Provinciale sections. These data are structured as the italian Dipartimento della Protezione Civile's JSONs are structured. This class is intended as a Singleton. The instance is accessible via DataParser::getDPCDataInstance()

      • getOrderedGeoElements

        public java.util.ArrayList<GeographicElement> getOrderedGeoElements()
        Returns ordered array of GeographicElements. This array has the following skeleton: The first element is about national datas then follows regions (in alphabetical order) and for each region, follows all provinces that belongs to that region
        Returns:
        the array of GraphicElements, sorted
